title: 'Never Buy it.'
body: Buying means waste of money. I have bought it on 7 sep . After spending time on I relised that that the battery back is so poor u can't imagine it . Secondly cooling fan produce sound very loud and third button are not work properly. If u complain to return they will arrange a technician every time . They don't do anything to get better they will se everything is ok. So please don't waste your money . Please buy from offline market .

title: 'Bad Service'
body: 'Do not buy this new model as if any part is not working properly or is defective service is delayed a lot. I have been waiting for my speaker to be replaced and it has been more than a month all I get as an answer is the laptop is a new model so new speakers are not available.  Think twice before buying this product. Try a more trustworthy company.'
